description: These names refer to a Gedeckt of octave (4') pitch or small scale.
examplesDescription: Nearly all known examples are at 4' pitch; some exceptions are listed below.

examples.name: Kleingedackt 8', Oberwerk; Klosterkirche, Huysburg, Germany; Eule 1983.
Kleingedackt 2', Pedal; St Leonard's Church, Whitsbury, Wiltshire, England; Willis 1963.
Kleingedackt 4', Hauptwerk; Abbey, Muri, Switzerland; Schott 1630 (restored 1971). This is the oldest known example.
